name: Hadrulf's Viral Belt Component Platform

items.alias: Disassembled Belt with Memory and Compiler

raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ #L "Inertial Adjustment Processing Unit" "257959" >= QL240 #L "Viral Data Storage" "251225" >= QL240 #L "Overheated Compiler" "251221" >= QL240 #L "Cannister of Powder" "253153" >= QL240 ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Viral Data Storage + Inertial Adjustment Processing Unit = #L "Disassembled Belt with Memory" "257540" Skills: | ?? | ------------------------------ Overheated Compiler + Disassembled Belt with Memory = #L "Disassembled Belt with Memory and Compiler" "257541" Skills: | ?? | ------------------------------ Cannister of Powder + Disassembled Belt with Memory and Compiler = #L "Hadrulf's Viral Belt Component Platform" "257119" Skills: | ?? | Note: To remove the "Atrox Only" equipping requirement of a QL 250+ #L "Diamondine Kick Pistol" "165168" or #L "Murder Maul" "233336", combine them with the #L "Inertial Adjustment Processing Unit" "257959". ------------------------------ Comments ------------------------------ Awesome belts for those with the AI expansion.
